title: Single parent
summary: A single parent is a person who lives with a child or children and who does not have a spouse or live-in partner.  Reasons for becoming a single parent include divorce, break-up, abandonment, domestic violence, rape, death of the other parent, childbirth by a single person or single-person adoption. A single parent family is a family with children that is headed by a single parent.[1][2][3][4]
